text: Elizabeth Ann Berrington (born 3 August 1970) is an English actress and graduate of the Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art. She is best known for portraying the roles of Mel Debrou in the ITV satirical comedy-drama series Moving Wallpaper (2008–2009), Ruby Fry in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2009–2011), Paula Kosh in the Sky 1 comedy-drama series Stella (2012–2013, 2015–2017), and Dawn Stevenson in the BBC drama series The Syndicate (2015). Berrington has also portrayed minor roles on British dramas such as The Bill, Doc Martin, Doctor Who, The Office, Casualty, The Lakes, The Grimleys, Rose and Maloney and Sex Education. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Entertainers from Merseyside Category:People from Wirral
title: Elizabeth Berrington
